Welcome Hikers

Sign up and get ready to hike!

About Texas Adventure Time

We are an official, University of Texas at Austin sponsored club that is committed to afford UT students the opportunity to go out and hike in nature.

Dues

We are committed to keeping the cost of membership as low as possible. Hikers would only have to pay for the price of each hike they attend. Trip prices are calculated based on cost of admission into various parks and gas compensation for drivers.

Contact

Feel free to reach out to us at TexasAdventureTime@gmail.com
